title: Legacy vs Dire Wolves - The Battle for First
body:
When we started the split, if someone had of told me that Dire Wolves and Legacy would be the 2 teams fighting for first in week 5 I would have scoffed. Legacy historically had a weaker early part of the season and the Dire Wolves roster had been gutted with the loss of ADC prodigy K1ng, and the Chiefs have always been the dominant team in Split 1.

Yet here we are, Week 5 and Legacy and Dire Wolves are the 2 remaining undefeated teams in the OPL. Dire Wolves, the OPL Legend title holders, upset the Chiefs in Week 2 to position themselves as the major threat in the league, and Legacy have demolished every single team they have played this split in one sided series.

We sat down with Carbon to get some insight into Legacy's performance this year

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7u1z7CJvto8

Tonight starting around 8pm AEDT (Following the first Bo3), Legacy and Dire Wolves battle to find out which team will stand alone at the top (for now).

Who do you think will take the match?

replies.body: dire WOLVES zeratul > k1ng gg ezpzz
DYAH WOHLVES http://www.myinstants.com/instant/dyah-wolfsz/

direWOFIANS
dyrePUPPIES
dire wVOOLLESS
diredoges
The only way LGC would beat Dire Wolves is if they had a good adc like Zenk.

Dire wolves tends to like farming up until the point they are on a powerspike. but this doesnt mean they are passive team, they have shown their skirmish in the jungle can snowball their game and hit their powerspike faster (as shown in sin game).

but legacy plays around the whole map, playing around objective, controlling the side wave management and carbon regret's jungle support synergy in enemy jungle, as such they look like a 5man moving around the map.

Role to watch out for tonight: Top lane

Both tally and sharp are quiet new to their respectable roles transitioning from carry role to top,

both Tally and Sharp has impressed me from their previous games, from playing carry champs such as quinn/fiora to more supportive  lissandra/lulu.

with the meta fading from tanky champ and more carry champ i believe top lane will have the most impact tonight. Who will have more cs (from lane swap perhaps), Who will shove their lane first?? Who will have the counter pick match up?? 

Champion to look out for:

{{champion:429}}  {{champion:114}}  {{champion:117}}  {{champion:133}}  {{champion:42}}  {{champion:13}} 

i think both teams should stay away from gangplank lol

In summary i think tonights match will be exciting and i cant wait for two titans to fight for OPL title :)

My prediction?? hmmmm 2-0/1 to legacy
Nice post except for the prediction part. Is it maybe a typo? {{champion:4}} {{champion:154}}

Gaming house vs. the mechanics crew, what a battle for 1st! 
My moneys on neither however, as i'm entirely **unbiased**. Nice try Benji, nice try.
I don't want to see what skyen does if the tree loses to the wolves so we gotta win{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Legacy have been stomping everyone but i believe that today we will see good Dire Wolves spirit!
You a GENIUS. Go Dire Wolves!

Legacy 2-0 they are simply the more complete team in every facet. I don't even think DW have a mechanics advantage. Tally will continue to impress and sharp will continue to be lackluster by comparison.

The biggest x-factor are the adcs. They both have the ability to carry hard or get caught out at critical moments.

Legacy are communicating on another level to the other OPL teams and they demonstrate that in their macro play and coordinated engages.

Dire Wolves 3-0 they are simply the team with more Phantiks. I don't even think LGC have an advantage. Raes will continue to impress and King will continue to be lackluster by comparison.

Dire Wolves are communicating on another level to the other OPL teams and they demonstrate that in their macro play and coordinated engages.
Legacy with a easy 2-1 imo. Both are good teams, but Legacy will prevail for a swift Victory.
direWOLVES
dire WOLVES
DIRE WOOLVESSS

It's going to be a battle of control vs aggression.

If DW can snowball from aggressive risk taking they may be able to gain an advantage, but if LGC emerge from lane phase with map control they will choke the Dire Puppies out.
The only thing choking will be King
I'm feeling pretty strong that really the most that we could hope for with LGC is a 2-1 victory (the most we could HOPE for)
